'''''The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack''''' is an album comprising of the soundtrack from the theatrical release of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]''. It was released [[10 December]] [[2002]]. An extended soundtrack, based on the extended edition of the film, was later released as ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers - The Complete Recordings]]''.

==Contents==
# [[Foundations of Stone]] (3:52)
# [[The Taming of Sméagol (soundtrack)|The Taming of Sméagol]] (2:49)
# [[The Riders of Rohan (soundtrack)|The Riders of Rohan]] (4:06)
# [[The Passage of the Marshes (soundtrack)|The Passage of the Marshes]] (2:46)
# [[The Uruk-Hai]] (2:58)
# [[The King of the Golden Hall (soundtrack)|The King of the Golden Hall]] (3:50)
# [[The Black Gate Is Closed]] (3:17)
# [[Evenstar (soundtrack)|Evenstar]], featuring Isabel Bayakdarian (3:16)
# [[The White Rider (soundtrack)|The White Rider]] (2:28)
# [[Treebeard (soundtrack)|Treebeard]] (2:44)
# [[The Leave Taking]] (3:42)
# [[Helm's Deep (soundtrack)|Helm's Deep]] (3:53)
# [[The Forbidden Pool (soundtrack)|The Forbidden Pool]] (5:27)
# [[Breath of Life]] / Shelia Chandra (5:08)
# [[The Hornburg (soundtrack)|The Hornburg]] (4:36)
# [[Forth Eorlingas (soundtrack)|Forth Eorlingas]] / Ben Del Maestro (3:16)
# [[Isengard Unleashed (soundtrack)|Isengard Unleashed]] / Elizabeth Fraser (5:01)
# [[Samwise the Brave]] (3:46)
# [[Gollum's Song]], featuring [[Emilíana Torrini]] (5:53)
